headline: McCaffrey limited in practice with Achilles tweak
detail: Beat reporters note McCaffrey was limited in Wednesday's practice due to a minor Achilles issue. He's day-to-day but expected to play Sunday. Backup Jordan Mason saw extra reps.
fantasy_impact: Monitor for downgrade; consider Mason as streamer if McCaffrey sits
dynasty_relevance: N/A - redraft focus due to age and injury history

headline: Hall dominating backfield snaps in early practices
detail: Insiders report Hall taking 70%+ of first-team reps, with Braelon Allen as distant RB2. No signs of shared workload emerging.
fantasy_impact: RB1 upside locked in; hold in all formats
dynasty_relevance: Core dynasty asset with rising workload

headline: Robinson poised for 20+ touch breakout season
detail: Analysts buzzing about Robinson's Year 3 leap under new OC. Early camp reports show explosive plays and pass-game involvement.
fantasy_impact: Draft as high-end RB1 with upside
dynasty_relevance: Elite long-term RB1 potential

headline: Barkley full participant after minor hamstring scare
detail: Team accounts confirm Barkley practiced fully Thursday after brief hamstring concern. No lingering issues reported.
fantasy_impact: Safe to start; Eagles backfield lead intact
dynasty_relevance: N/A - age 28, redraft priority

headline: Henry entrenched as Ravens' lead back
detail: Reports indicate Henry handling all goal-line and early-down work, Justice Hill complementary only.
fantasy_impact: TD-dependent RB2 with weekly upside
dynasty_relevance: Declining dynasty value post-30

headline: Taylor nursing ankle sprain, return uncertain
detail: Insiders whisper Taylor's ankle from camp is slow to heal, potentially missing Week 1. Trey Sermon getting looks.
fantasy_impact: Fade in drafts until clarity; stash Sermon
dynasty_relevance: Injury concerns temper long-term outlook

headline: Achane locked in as primary receiving back
detail: Beat reports confirm Achane leading in routes run, Mostert handling early downs. Pass-game target share surging.
fantasy_impact: PPR machine; target in drafts
dynasty_relevance: High-upside young speedster

headline: Gibbs-Montgomery committee solidified
detail: Analysts agree on 50/50 split, Gibbs edging in targets and sweeps. Both viable flexes.
fantasy_impact: RB2 with flex appeal in PPR
dynasty_relevance: Preferred half in committee

headline: Williams trending toward workhorse role
detail: Rams insiders report Williams taking 80% snaps in preseason, Blake Corum rotational.
fantasy_impact: Late-round RB1 candidate
dynasty_relevance: Building value as lead back

headline: Rumors swirl of Cook trade to contender
detail: Fantasy chatter suggests Bills shopping Cook for draft picks amid Ray Davis emergence. Unconfirmed but gaining traction.
fantasy_impact: Sell high if rumors heat up
dynasty_relevance: Trade could reset value

headline: McCaffrey returns to full practice participation
detail: Beat reporters confirm McCaffrey practiced fully after missing time with Achilles injury. Team insiders note he's on track for Week 1 return. No setbacks reported in recent sessions.
fantasy_impact: Clear path to RB1 workload; stash confidently for championship push
dynasty_relevance: Elite asset retains top-3 dynasty value post-recovery

headline: Hall limited in practice due to knee soreness
detail: Fantasy analysts highlight Hall's limited snaps in Wednesday practice. Beat reports suggest minor knee issue but expected to play. Monitoring for Thursday update.
fantasy_impact: Risky flex play; prepare backup if misses practice Friday
dynasty_relevance: High-upside dynasty RB; injury history caps ceiling slightly

headline: Barkley dominating backfield touches in Eagles OTAs
detail: Team insiders report Barkley handling 70%+ of first-team reps. Beat writers note reduced role for backups like Gainwell. Early depth chart solidifies his lead role.
fantasy_impact: Lock in as top-5 RB draft target with heavy workload
dynasty_relevance: Prime age boosts long-term RB1 potential in Philly

headline: Brooks eyeing mid-season return from ACL rehab
detail: Fantasy analysts speculate Brooks could debut by Week 6 based on recovery buzz. Insiders mention steady progress but no firm timeline. Chuba Hubbard holds fort meantime.
fantasy_impact: Dynasty stash; redraft owners avoid until confirmed return
dynasty_relevance: Rookie upside makes him handcuff gold for long-term rosters

headline: Williams cemented as Rams' lead back post-OTAs
detail: Beat reporters confirm Williams atop depth chart after dominating reps. Team accounts highlight his efficiency in camp. Backup Stevenson secondary option.
fantasy_impact: RB2 with upside; target in mid-rounds confidently
dynasty_relevance: N/A - redraft focus with moderate long-term outlook

headline: Gibbs splitting carries evenly with Montgomery in camp
detail: Insiders note 50/50 split in practice reps between Gibbs and Montgomery. Fantasy chatter suggests committee persists into season. Gibbs edges in passing downs.
fantasy_impact: High-end RB2; volume cap limits weekly ceiling
dynasty_relevance: Youth and explosiveness solidify top-10 dynasty RB status

headline: Henry looks explosive in Ravens training camp drills
detail: Beat writers praise Henry's burst and power in early camp footage. Team insiders confirm no limitations on reps. Pairing with Jackson boosts goal-line role.
fantasy_impact: TD-dependent RB1; draft for Ravens' run-heavy scheme
dynasty_relevance: Age 30 tempers value; trade down in dynasty for youth

headline: Kamara nursing minor groin strain, practice questionable
detail: Fantasy analysts buzz about Kamara's limited participation amid groin whispers. Beat reports downplay severity but watch Week 1 status. Jamaal Williams ready to step up.
fantasy_impact: Fade in early drafts until practice ramp-up confirmed
dynasty_relevance: Contract year adds trade intrigue for dynasty managers

headline: Achane positioned for expanded role sans Mostert injury
detail: Insiders project Achane as primary back with Mostert banged up. Beat chatter highlights his speed in 3rd-down packages. Volume increase expected.
fantasy_impact: Boom RB3 with RB2 upside; handcuff priority
dynasty_relevance: Electric talent vaults into top-15 dynasty ranking

headline: White emerging as Raiders' RB1 in camp battles
detail: Beat reporters confirm White winning most first-team reps over Jacobs holdouts. Team accounts showcase his camp MVP status. Depth chart shift underway.
fantasy_impact: Late-round flier with starter potential in Vegas backfield
dynasty_relevance: N/A - Proven vets ahead limit long-term appeal
